message.body: Hey! Sorry I missed your call. I'm really emotional and don't really have a place to cry which would inevitably happen. Trying to repress repress repress to relax my dad. We're not emotionally healthy either around here...
My dads sure he's going to die in surgery on Wednesday so he's literally doing all his "lasts"
Oh god!! Feel and repress... Is that possible?
That he would die? Well, they're opening his heart which is intense but they do it all the time. His diabetis complicates things though. Higher chance of infection?
Oh god! I meant u should try to feel and repress but it's good I got the update. Yikes, tonight is a movie night, wish u were here or I was there...
Watching sohappyverymoreplease or whatever its called
Oh man, me too. So much. I think you'll really like this one. And it is possible to feel and repress. I should try to strike a balance. I'm just really struggling with the situation alone.
Hes been on a ski trip the last few days and had no reception. I'll see him tonight though
Hang in there and let me know if you need anything. Sending you love
Thank you. Ugh. Don't know if I want changes here so everyone can feel more comfortable or if I just want out which is te easier route.
Just saw her at Walgreens. I would've never thought of her again in my entire life
